annotations.description:
Build and run Go applications on CentOS 7. For more information about using this builder image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/golang-container/blob/master/README.md.

WARNING: By selecting this tag, your application will automatically update to use the latest version of Go available on OpenShift, including major versions updates.
